    The Slotkin Laboratory

    Welcome to the Slotkin laboratory! We are located at the Donald Danforth Plant Science Center in St. Louis, Missouri. We are also affiliated with the Division of Biological Sciences at the University of Missouri-Columbia. Follow this link to our lab’s page with the Danforth Center’s website. For our latest news and updates, follow Keith’s Twitter account.

    Research

    Our research focuses on understanding the epigenetic regulation of Transposable Elements (TEs). See here for a description of our research.
